titleStmt.title: The First and second part of the history of the famous Euordanus Prince of Denmark With the strange aduentures of Iago Prince of Saxonie: and of both theyr seuerall fortunes in loue.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by I. R[oberts]. for R. B[ankworth]. and are to be sold in Paules Church-yard, at the signe of the Sun,

notesStmt.note: Printer's and publisher's names from STC.
Caption title on A2r: The first part of the history of the famous Euordanus, Prince of Denmarke; with his aduentures, and fortune in loue.

In two parts; part 2 has caption title on M4r: The second part of the famous history of the two princes, Euordanus Prince of Denmarke, and Iago Prince of Saxonie, with their seuerall aduentures and fortunes in loue.
Item at reel 644:2 identified as STC 10566a.
Reproduction of original in the John Rylands University Library, Manchester, England.

place.placeName: Paules Church-yard, at the signe of the Sun
